summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 54, Terry's First Addition, being the alley between 7th Avenue and 8th Avenue from Madison Street to Marion Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same/all in accordance with Resolution No. 15496 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
